participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Artistic and passionate, Emily is a dreamer who values beauty and creativity in her life.
participant_1.background: I love to dance ballet but I'm not sure if my parents would approve. I love children. My favorite artist is Guns and Roses. On rainy days, I love to look at my collection of cycling-related items and think about my father. I am passionate about being a good dog parent to my collie.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Resourceful and family-oriented, David takes pride in his cooking skills and enjoys spending time with his loved ones.
participant_2.background: My friends would be impressed by my ability to make delicious food despite being broke. I eat fruits like apples and bananas for their natural sweetness. I am close to my mother, but not to my father. I have three sisters. I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas.

content.text: I am really into ballet, but I'm not sure my parents would approve.
That's interesting! What do you like about it?
I love the athleticism and the grace. It's such a beautiful art form.
I can see why you like it. It's definitely a beautiful art form.
I love to cook, especially when I'm broke. I can make some really delicious food with very little money.
That's awesome! I wish I could cook.
It's really not that hard! I can teach you some time if you want.
I would love that! I love food, so I would be really grateful.
Great! We can get together soon and I'll show you some of my favorite recipes.
That sounds great! I'm free on Saturday.
Perfect! I'll come over and we can cook together.
